summary: A-FRAME ON CAR HAS RUSTED OUT WHICH AT ANY TIME COULD SNAP CAUSE THE TRANSMISSION AND ENGINE TO DROP WHICH WILL CAUSE THE RIGHT PASSENGER WHEEL AXLE AND BEARING TO BREAK AND SNAP OFF WHICH IS A HAZARD. ALSO EMERGENCY PARKING BREAK HAS RUSTED OUT OF NOWHERE AND FELL INTO THE DRUM OF BACK WHEEL AND RUBS CAUSING A HAZARD AND LOUD NOISE., CHRYSLER COULD NOT EXPLAIN WHY EITHER ONE OF THESE THINGS HAPPENED WHEN NEITHER ARE BEING USED AND THE CAR WAS PURCHASED CERTIFIED NEW USED FROM DEALER 5YERS AGO. ALL OF THIS WAS DISCOVERED WHILE DRIVING AND I HEARD A SNAP AND A RATTLING SOUND WHILE DRIVING AND DECIDED TO TAKE IT TO A SHOP AND THEY FOUND THE BIGGER PROBLEM.
